title: Costa Vida
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast-food chain restaurant serving Mexican food. Several lacto-veg choices. The salsas are vegan suitable as are the non-grilled tortillas, black and pinto beans, vinaigrette and mango dressings, tortilla soup, guacamole. Note that the cilantro lime rice contains dairy, and the roasted green chile sauce and the red enchilada sauce both contain meat stock.
